Sorry all, I've been sick. In and out of the hospital. Between being 
sick and working, I haven't been able to get on line. Forgive me all, 
you have my most sincere appologies. Please inform me of the current 
situations. Where are the chars that my chars are dealing with and 
what is going on so that I may catch up. Thank you all.

Logo
